className.description: The name of the step bar class

current.description: Specify the current step, starting with 0. In child step elements, the status can be overridden by the 'status' attribute
current.description_zh: 指定当前步骤，从 0 开始记数。在子 Step 元素中，可以通过 `status` 属性覆盖状态

direction.description: Specify the step bar orientation. Currently, both horizontal and vertical orientations are supported
direction.description_zh: 指定步骤条方向。目前支持水平（`horizontal`）和竖直（vertical）两种方向

initial.description: The starting sequence number, starting from 0
initial.description_zh: 起始序号，从 0 开始记数

labelPlacement.description: Specify the position of the label, the default is to place the label horizontally on the right side of the icon, and optionally vertical to put it below the icon
labelPlacement.description_zh: 指定标签放置位置，默认水平放图标右侧，可选 vertical 放图标下方

percent.description: Progress bar progress displayed by the current 'process' step (only for basic type Steps)
percent.description_zh: 当前 `process` 步骤显示的进度条进度（只对基本类型的 Steps 生效）

progressDot.description: The dotted step bar can be set to a function, and labelPlacement will be forced to vertical
progressDot.description_zh: 点状步骤条，可以设置为一个 function，labelPlacement 将强制为 vertical

responsive.description: When the screen width is less than '532px', it automatically changes to vertical mode
responsive.description_zh: 当屏幕宽度小于 `532px` 时自动变为垂直模式

size.description: Specify the size, currently supports normal ('default') and mini ('small')
size.description_zh: 指定大小，目前支持普通（`default`）和迷你（`small`）

status.description: Specify the status of the current step, optionally 'wait', 'process', 'finish' error
status.description_zh: 指定当前步骤的状态，可选 `wait` `process` `finish` error

type.description: Step bar type, you can choose 'default' 'navigation' inline

StepItem.name: status
StepItem.description: 指定状态。当不配置该属性时，会使用 Steps 的 `current` 来自动指定状态。可选：`wait` `process` `finish` error

events.name: onChange
events.description: Triggered when you click to switch steps
